post.title: wide angle and 2x teleconverter on ebay
post.content: saw this combo kit on ebay for my s5 is ,the price is definitely right,i'm a little leery about the quality though. i emailed the seller for the brand name but i haven't heard back yet. anybody have one or know of them? here's a link. http://cgi.ebay.ca/lens-accessory-co...713.m153.l1262
